subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Luke Donald, in pursuit of Webb Simpson and the top spot on the PGA money list, shot a six-under-par 66 in the first round of the Children’s Miracle Network Classic in Lake Buena Vista, Fla.
snippet: Luke Donald, in pursuit of Webb Simpson and the top spot on the PGA money list, shot a six-under-par 66 in the first round of the Children’s Miracle Network Classic in Lake Buena Vista, Fla.
